column2: Ordered an iced matcha latte and a chicken club with pesto and it was so delicious!! The latte was a perfect flavor, earthy but still creamy and mild, with honey sweetener! The sandwich was so tasty, smokey from the bacon, substantial with chicken and cheese, and flavorful with the pesto condiments and fresh tomato and arugula!! The service was wonderful, so nice and fast, the cafe was clean and tranquil in a nice environment :) I strongly recommend!!

Great experience at this lovely cafe! Owner is very attentive and is proud of the quality of food being served. We had a breakfast bagel with egg, cheese and bacon as well as a funky avocado toast with a boiled egg on top. Coffee was delicious and the space is very relaxed. Happy we got to try this place on our trip!

I walked by and stopped for a quick Espresso. Nice little cafe with outdoor and indoor seating. Inside it feels like little Italy. A fancy Espresso Machine, small delicious pastry and a nice selection of breakfast, sandwiches, salads and more. What stood out to me was the friendliness from the very beginning. Absolut amazing. You feel so comfortable here. Almost like home or on vacation in Italy. Very kind. Not to forget, Espresso was excellent and the pastry super delicious. Try the trio (mini bomboloni) - it won’t disappoint you. I just added this place to my favorite coffee and breakfast places in San Francisco. I will definitely come back. Thank you

Delicious food and coffee, healthy options as well as tasty treats offered and all delicious. Everything is obviously made with skill and quality ingredients. The menu has so many great options, too.  The atmosphere is great too, the interior is clean and beautiful. Everything is small and quaint but neat and well put together. There are even plants on the window sill you can purchase from another local shop. There's calm Italian music playing. It's got such a great vibe for a slow, relaxing, beautiful place to enjoy your food and drinks.  The service was also fantastic! One of the two days I visited, they had a massive rush mid morning and they rocked it. A worker even went around after the rush died down and made sure everyone was happy and got the right thing. Definitely they give more service than a typical cafe.

Excellent and warm masters of hospitality, americanos, lattes, lox bagels, and so much more!  I wish I had enough time to try everything on the menu, unfortunately I am a tourist at the moment.  The space is so inviting and CC is so beyond what I envisioned what a great a cafe in San Francisco would be.

Stopped in for a coffee and breakfast. The food was fantastic and so was the coffee. Seems to be family owned and operated and the people were very friendly and accommodating. Next time I’m in the area I will be stopping again. Thank you for a great Friday morning breakfast.

A gem on the corner of Mason St. And Chestnut. After walking around seeing the sites and sounds, we stop here for a late lunch. Everyone there was so nice! Service was excellent and the Caffé is charming. They ran out of falafel but more than willing to substitute with chicken or another alternative. All the sandwiches were made with care and had fresh ingredients. If you are touring and want a nice place to stop and just breathe... This is a great spot.

Wonderful experience! This is a cute, family-owned cafe run by husband and wife. They both are so friendly and welcoming! I visited a few times during my trip to San Francisco and they remembered who I was during my repeat visits. They really show appreciation for all their customers. I love their golden turmeric latte. During my last visit, I also got a chicken pesto sandwich, which was delicious. I would definitely go back if I'm back in San Francisco!
I ordered the veggie bagel! Not bad! Many dishes inside. The service was good! The one who I believe he’s the owner was kind and passionate to customers. And he recommended me the hummus dip to try.
I absolutely love this place! The staff is friendly, the coffee is some of the best I’ve ever had. Great attention to detail. Cozy inside for work and sunny quite outside.

First time ever visiting SF and was walking down to pier 33 with my husband and son and stumbled across this place and we loved it ! We got Turkey BLT’s and they were very good, they were loaded sandwiches , they were cut in half and we were ok with eating a half and saving the other for later . The man that attended us was super friendly and our sandwiches were made to order in a timely matter, I absolutely loved them, so filling and good, if I’m ever around SF again I definitely will go back😃😃
Really nice and cozy cafe! It'sa hidden gem!! Amazing coffee, amazing food, amazing service! Would definitely come again!!
Been working from here this morning, Great atmosphere, Cozy and really nice people! Coffee and bagels are woww!!! Thanks guys 🙏🏼

This was our  go-to place for breakfast during our 4 day stay in SF. Good food and hands-down  the best customer service at a restaurant I’ve ever had. The owner is personable. Greets you with a smile every day and makes sure that each and every customer is well taken care of.

A lovely little cafe. I visited San Francisco for a week and had the pleasure to get breakfast from Caffe Capriccio multiple times. One time, I couldn't make it and the staff actually remembered us and asked my friends where I had gone. They even gave us homemade pastries on the house.  As a vegan, they did not have the most options, but I made small adjustments to some items and they still tasted delicious. Highly recommend.

The owner allowed me to taste the coffees to find one I liked. Had a double shot coffee which was fantastic. Full of flavour and nice and strong. Far better than others we have had. To go with it, we had a double baked croissant which was nice, crunchy and delicious. Although small and out of the way, I would recommend this little caffe.
Epitome of a cozy Cafe. And I do love a cozy Cafe. Perfect coffee, good prices, fresh orange juice. 🍊 ☕️ 🥯

Lovely! 💜 Molto buonissimo! Stayed at the Hotel across the street and just dropped in for an espress and to get some work done. What a pleasant surprise! Clean, comfortable, fast WiFi and excellent espresso! We speak Italian and found that the owner did, too. We felt right at home. 😊 Food was great, too. (Torta alla Nonna!) If you need a quiet caffè to get some work done or meet up with friends or coworkers, I highly recommend this Caffè!!

I ate there on 25 September 22 and enjoyed the bagel with egg and sausage. The chili paste served with it was super tasty too. The coffee was high standard (like good Australian coffee) and the service was friendly. I ate outside and bathed in the sun. It was a great last breakfast for my recent trip to North America. I wish them the best
Unfortunatly I haven’t done the good choice for my breakfast. My sandwich was classic and not generous. 3 avocado slim slice. Nice welcome.
Good coffee, good sandwiches, excellent service - very hospitable and personable! We loved coming here everyday while in SF
Bit on the pricey side, food took a while, and my sandwich was oh so slightly burnt on the outside. Not the best café as there are better options around the area. 7/10
Great breakfast ever great service
quiet little cafe for lunch. best panini sandwich i’ve had in sf — chicken bacon arugula tomato with spicy pesto
What an amazing little spot! Stopped for a quick drink after a morning of waking, staff were really nice and friendly. 100% recommend it if your in the area!!!
The best coffee in this area. Quiet and lovely place to relax.

Today , i tried caffe capriccio for the first time and it was a great expression, food was great , service is even better . If you are around north beach and looking for a spot to eat , caffe capriccio would be the best.
The food was very tasty and the man working there was great. I would definitely go back.
Great spot! Great coffee! Great food! Super friendly staff. 10/10 would come back!
The persons working there are so nice, and the chef prepares the food deliciously!! We had the avocado egg bagel, iced vanilla latte and for dessert a cinnamon roll 10/10
Great spot! Super friendly staff, were very flexible with my kids requests. Very good selection of sandwiches and salads. Perfect spot for a snack or light meal.
Great place!! Super nice owner, delicious coffee and food, relaxing ambiance. I love coming here
Loved the service and atmosphere.  Really enjoyed the coyote meandering down the middle of the street. Haha

I LOVE this place! I live nearby and it's my neighborhood breakfast / lunch / coffee spot. Every time I'm there and see tourists who have stumbled upon it, it makes me happy they've found this local gem that is sure to make them fall in love with San Francisco and North Beach.  Their egg wrap is my favorite! It's prepared to order with a real egg and the lightly dressed greens they put in it are amazing. It's delicious and such a nice alternative to a greasy egg wrap or burrito and I always feel great after eating it. Their coffee is really good too! They're just a block or two up from Starbucks and their coffee is SO MUCH BETTER.  Their service is also great. They are super friendly and they've taken great COVID precautions. It's also really nice that you can see them making the food so you know that it's clean and safely prepared. I can't recommend this place enough!
Good coffee, excellent sandwiches, and great service.

This is a cute little place on the corner not too far off the beaten path if you're taking in San Francisco. It wasn't super busy and the wait was a bit long, but if you're not in a rush, swing in and enjoy.

One of the many many great cafes in the north beach. What Capriccio has going for it is that it is actually pretty far away from most of the other cafes in little italy in north beach. You feel like you are getting far from the maddening crowd when you check out this little place on Mason street.  The drinks were excellent and I was always impressed by the food. The wraps were large and always tasty and came with a salad for a nice filling lunch. The drinks can be a pit pricey but its worth dropping 15 bucks to go to a quiet area and work and not be bothered by a ton of people coming in and out like you see and many cafes in north beach.  I especially liked the work area in Capriccio. The wifi was strong and the seating was comfortable. They have a large couch area in the back with pillows and plenty of outside seating to enjoy the rare sight of sun in the area.
Great neighborhood spot, top tier service.
My wife and I spend wonderful 45 Minutes here :) the cappuccino was awesome and the store owner is super friendly.  If I could give 10 stars I would .
Delicious food, lovely atmosphere. We were a little lost on our walk but glad we found this place. 😊

Tucked away on a quiet corner in North beach is this little gem. Great coffee, but great art plasters the walls. Old iconic photos of San Francisco history.  I am not sure if any of the art is for sale, but its worth inquiring
Good selection of bagels and sandwiches. Very good cappuccino
Great service and tasty food.

One of the best coffee I have tasted in US (from a European´s standpoint). The place could need a upgrade and some painting but the service was good and the coffee was excellent. They also have free WiFi and mobile phone chargers available for no cost.

Very cool little coffee shop away from all the tourist attractions. Felt very homely. Coffee was pretty good. I had a Nutella Latte which was good, but could've had some more flavor. Still beats Starbucks.

This awesome little place was close to our hotel when we were in San Francisco recently. As we walked by, I thought it looked pretty cool so we decided to grab a quick mocha. Wow.  The Mocha was SO goood. Seriously, the best. I went back the next morning to have another, try their quiche and get some work done. Nice people, great little place, for sure.

I was happy that they could do up a soy decaf latte for me. Had a nice little bit of lemon cake too. It was an enjoyable and chill place for a coffee with friends. Liked that it was unpretentious and relaxed unlike other fancy cafes.
Super friendly staff and wonderful coffee
No gluten free. Looks lovely.

I haven't tried the food as there aren't any vegan options that I would choose but the coffee is good, service is friendly, and it's a great spot to sit outside and people-watch. Would be great to see a few vegan additions to the menu

Cute little cafe with amazing coffee and lattes (got the Americano and Iced Chai Latte) and sandwiches. I particularly enjoyed the California Turkey Pannini, Caprese Pannini and the Smoked Salmon Bagel. Exceptional service, super friendly staff! Great to hang out in, read a book or study/work with a laptop. Will definitely come again if I visit San Fran in the future!

Really cute cafe with great customer service! I was near Pier 39 and looking for a cafe I could do some work in. After a quick "best coffices" search on Google I found this GEM. I bought an iced coffee and a super yummy "Mexicali" quiche. I'm normally not that big of a fan of quiches but this one has a nice blend of cheesy, spicy goodness! The barista/cashier was really sweet and was helpful, giving me recommendations, as I had never been there before. Some tourists around but not overrun like the Starbucks a couple blocks up. Will definitely return to this cafe!

False advertisement! no latte art! Extremely hot mediocre coffee with with an attempt of a heart shape... the prosciutto di Parma panini was more of a cheap ham from supermarket 🤬 the lady was super nice and she was by her self doing everything poor lady was overworked! …
Healthy and hearty breakfast and lunch items and great espresso coffee. All counter serve. No pretentious needed. I had the lox bagel - absolutely perfect.
Friendly staff, good food and decent prices !
Yummy and healthy food for a good price. We went there twice for breakfast while we were in San Francisco. Great place also for just grabbing coffee.
Pleasant, tasty cafe. 2 person team. Fun pictures of famous people line the walls. Lots of bagel, croissant, and wrap type fare.
Best spot for an amazing lunch, reasonably priced. Very friendly staff. Good environment, too. Away from the chaos of tourist town, but not too far away either.
My breve latte is perfect. The croissant was toasted not microwaved. Frank Sinatra on the speakers and good vibes! Highly recommended.
Fresh ingredients…. Owner was awesome! Food is great!
Good coffee. Nice staff. Usually cozy, but can get crowded with laptops. Favorite place to sit is perched at the tall table by the window.
This cafe has undergone a great modern renovation and is now open again.
Very friendly personnel, awesome food/coffee and the possibility to enjoy your servings outside in a nice atmosphere. Very reasonable prices aswell!
The bagel sandwiches are amazing
The places is awesome as for the coffee I have to say that it's great I am a barista myself and would totally recommend it !
Super friendly customer service, Tea was very good .
Excellent breakfast and sweet staff, not worth waiting around at Mama's, go here instead! Coffee is amazeballs
Great breakfast with great coffees. Service was very good and food was delicious and out quite quickly.....
Hidden gem  Great little independent cafe, with fresh food and coffee, smoked salmon bagel was delicious.
This is the best coffee place of San Francisco. The people there are super friendly and the food is delicious and fresh
Cute little corner place. Good coffee and it looked like other customers were enjoying the food.
Latte was delicious. Food was decent. Staff was friendly. Ample seating for a cafe.
Good coffee, very fine bagel breakfast, friendly service, in North Beach backstreets
Fast friendly service. Had a egg and ham bagel, it was delicious. Good prices!
nice place for breakfast , lovely staff
Great place to stop for coffee and breakfast sandwich. The servers were so nice and helpful.
Good coffee and really tasty food! Staff is very friendly.
They make one of the best coffees in SF. They know how to make it without the bitter taste and it's delicious!
Great coffee and Food!
Stopped here on our bike ride and got a chicken carsar wrap. Ended up being phenomenal, definitly recommend it!
Nice cafe in a quiet location.  Good food, decent portions.  Outlets and wifi.
Great place in the morning to stop, chill and eat if you’re looking for a break from the Wharf riff raff!
Neighborhood cafe. Great staff. Great price. No low fat milk available.
Healthy tasty sandwiches coffee and tea.  Great service.
Great breakfast sandwiches and coffee. Goid prices. Friendly staff.
Great coffee and food!
Home is where the heart is. This is what I think about whenever I think of Cappricio. I love this Cafe, the excellent staff and their lattes!
MY FAVORITE NEIGHBORHOOD COFFEE SHOP ❤️ great food, coffee, service and ambiance. Thanks!
Stopped past for a bite to eat and we were so impressed! Absolutely DELICIOUS paninis!
I love this place, service is great and the coffee is damned good too.
The people that work there will treat you very good. They please me making me a new menu.
They're so nice here & their pastrami sandwich is great!
Great food, very nice atmosphere, warm and attentive service
Yummy coffee and a very good quiche. WiFi was working and appreciated.
Nice vibe and a great chai!
Sweet little place, great service, tasty food and coffee.
Amazing mocha...real Italian coffee! Good job!
Great little coffeeshop at North Beach. Mostly locals go there.
Fast, friendly, tasty food and plenty of seating, including outside.
Free wifi, lots of power outlets, and really tasty sandwiches and vegan goods.
Amazing quaint neighborhood cafe. Great food and coffee
Friendly staff, good food at reasonable prices.
Fantastic corner spot with well made drinks and great ambiance.
Great place for breakfast & lunch. Food was very good
Friendly staff and great coffee and food.
Awesome coffee and staff, love this place...
Nice coffee and friendly service
Nice staff. Had a delicious  quiche.
Tiny Italian cafe with delicious coffee.
We enjoyed it. Walking distance from where we stayed.
Best Coffee I had in the US. Seriously!
Best NZ style coffee in San Fran
What happened to this place? There is nothing to like anymore in the food or beverage offerings.
Excellent service and solid cappuccino
I now Charles Farruggia. He is the owner
Friendly cozy place for a cup of coffee
Decent place. I'll go again.
Best cafe in North Beach
Best coffee in San Francisco.
Great choice for a coffee place
Just ok
Nothing spectacular
Tasty breakfast wraps
lovely, perfect cappuccino!
Yummy coffee and food!
Delicious
Huge delicious lattes
Great sandwichs
Beatiful name and that’s it
Nice cappuccino!
Best cappucino!
Yum
Good coffee
Friendly guys
Yucky latte
EXCELLENT! We had breakfast here two days, super rich coffee and sandwiches. Excellent attention!

Cafe latte is sold, but meals are quite good. It is recommended because the egg was delicious. I'm glad I can spend my time on the terrace seat. Of course there is also a Wi-Fi spot. It will close at 4 o'clock.
The best coffee you can have in San Francisco, they are also very nice.
Good cafe for breakfast or more, highly recommended
Tarek is a great guy and a great barista!!!! And he speaks impeccable French too!!!! Best place for an excellent Latte/Flat White in San Francisco!!!!

Warm welcome and service.  The granola is scrumptious. Very good egg wrap. "Breakfast perfect" very good. The fruit salad lacks maple syrup and variety of fruit.  The coffees and hot chocolates are perfectly made.
The perfect breakfast is very good for a breakfast! A few bits of bananas, apples, cranberries, cottage cheese and cereals: a balanced breakfast to start the day off right ☀
Delicious coffee, great sandwiches (ask for no spicy, Amala!), really pleasant service. Recommends
Yummy cappuccino and brioche!!! Owners kind and available to every customer need! Highly recommended!
Beautiful place to have a coffee, accompanied by something delicious, sitting on the sidewalk. It is a quiet neighborhood and they serve it to you in a cup. In your face Starbucks ;)
I had a great breakfast, very friendly staff!
Very good service, nice and clean and most important a good taste in every bite. Very good taste and service.
We had breakfast and it was all good. Pleasant cafeteria with terrace.
Good selection and some homemade there. I felt very comfortable there.
Nice café, friendly service, free WiFi. Excellent!
Rich and frothy machine coffee, very good pastry.
Good atmosphere. Fine food!
great coffee
Perfect American.😊
Nice cafe!
Nice cafe
